\begin{array}{c}\n\text { Putnam 2014: B1 } \\\nd_{k} 10^{k}+\cdots+d_{0} 10^{0} \\\nd_{k} \neq 0 \\\nd_{i} \in\{0,1, \ldots, 9,10\}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Putnam 2014: B1 } [/imath] [imath]d_{k} 10^{k}+\cdots+d_{0} 10^{0} [/imath] [imath]d_{k} eq 0 [/imath] [imath]d_{i} \in\{0,1, \ldots, 9,10\}[/imath]
